data.eml:eml: A preliminary checklist of the skippers (Rhopalocera: Hesperiidae) of Guangxi, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xue, Guo-Xi, Sun, Hao, Sun, Zhou, Wang, Shao-Neng (2016): A preliminary checklist of the skippers (Rhopalocera: Hesperiidae) of Guangxi, China. Zootaxa 4147 (3): 311-334, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4147.3.5
